tool_description: Monitors operational status of HVAC equipment including fans, pumps, chillers, and boilers, detecting failures and performance degradation.

equipment_ids.description: List of equipment identifiers to monitor

check_runtime.description: Include runtime hours analysis in status check

error_messages: Equipment not found: One or more equipment_ids are not recognized in the system.
Communication timeout: Unable to retrieve status from equipment within timeout period.
Equipment offline: Some equipment is not responding to status requests.
usage: Provide equipment_ids array and optionally enable check_runtime. Returns current operational status and health indicators for each piece of equipment.

online_count.description: Number of equipment units currently online

offline_count.description: Number of equipment units currently offline

fault_count.description: Number of equipment units reporting faults

equipment_status.description: Status for each equipment: online, offline, fault, maintenance

runtime_hours.description: Runtime hours for each equipment unit

overall_health.description: Overall system health: excellent, good, fair, poor, critical
